vecUnachieved.strDescription: Have Singh's back when it matters most.
Fully upgrade a branch of your Augmentation Tree.

vecUnachieved.strName: I Can Only Fight Enemies I Can See
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Complete one Hacking Challenge with Fog Security without using a Reveal Software.
Cross enemy territory like a ghost, raising no hostile reaction from anyone.
Install at least one experimental augmentation.
With Koller's help and the Neuroplasticity Calibrator, eliminate overclocking for experimental augs.
Complete & win the debate with Talos Rucker.
Engage in all Tutorials in Adam's first mission in Dubai.
You completed Deus Ex: Mankind Divided on any difficulty.

vecUnachieved.strName: Ground Mail Was a Better Option
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Flawlessly disable a Drone via Remote Hacking.
Fully upgrade a weapon of your choice.
Deus Ex Is All About Cucumbers…

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/337000/extras/Jensen-Icarus-Dash.jpg?t=1513077042[/img]
The year is 2029, and mechanically augmented humans have now been deemed outcasts, living a life of complete and total segregation from the rest of society. 

Now an experienced covert operative, Adam Jensen is forced to operate in a world that has grown to despise his kind. Armed with a new arsenal of state-of-the-art weapons and augmentations, he must choose the right approach, along with who to trust, in order to unravel a vast worldwide conspiracy.

Buy Deus Ex: Mankind Divided now and receive the following bonus content FREE:
[list][*]“Desperate Measures” extra in-game mission 
[*]Covert Agent Pack (Intruder Gear, Enforcer Gear and Classic Gear + 1 Praxis Kit + 1000 Credits)[/list]
data.strSnippet: Now an experienced covert operative, Adam Jensen is forced to operate in a world that has grown to despise his kind. Armed with a new arsenal of state-of-the-art weapons and augmentations, he must choose the right approach, along with who to trust, in order to unravel a vast worldwide conspiracy.
